amendment.description: To ensure that IAEA inspection equipment is not used for espionage purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 5181 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 27 - 71. Record Vote Number: 267.

action.text: Amendment SA 5181 proposed by Senator Ensign. (consideration: CR S11009-11010; text: CR S11010) To ensure that IAEA inspection equipment is not used for espionage purposes.
